solution_line_template: If you add all the songs together, Gabe's playlist is {song1_length} + {song2_length} + {song3_length} = <<{song1_length}+{song2_length}+{song3_length}={playlist_length}>>{playlist_length} minutes long.

During the {ride_duration}-minute car ride, Gabe can listen to his {playlist_length}-minute playlist {ride_duration} / {playlist_length} = <<{ride_duration}/{playlist_length}={times_can_listen}>>{times_can_listen} times.
